channel.title: Astral Projection
channel.description: Has anyone else ever tried astral projection? I've been trying to project over the last few days, and I've almost done it. In fact, I'm quite sure I've left my body, though I won't discuss why I'm sure; I don't want to get too long-winded. All I will say is that I left my body for a few seconds before being slammed down into it again. I suspect that my physical body was getting cold, and decided to not let me go far without wearing a blanket. Also, in the process of trying astral projection, I've found an amazing method of relaxation. Anyways, discuss astral projection and your experiences with it.

item.title: Astral Projection
item.dc:creator: @LegendaryLoser .Flair
item.description:
@LegendaryLoser wrote:

I’d like to try it, I just haven’t found the time.

Read full topic
